true: Name at start of file
Name with leading whitespace: true
Name with trailing whitespace: true
Name with whitespace on each end: 123.0
Name surrounded by literal curly braces: {string value}
Name surrounded by literal backslashes: \string value\
Name surrounded by literal backslash/brace sequences: \{string value\}

Escaped brackets: {123}
Escaped backslash/brace sequences: \{123\}
